comment._content: Possibly her husband? projects.latimes.com/hollywood/star-walk/john-charles-tho... Singer and child actress Ruby Rothnour married baritone John Charles Thomas in 1913; apparently they divorced in 1923, but maybe as early as 1916: books.google.com/books?id=Pi4HyzVJnFwC&lpg=PA24&o...
